name: Instant Pot® Broccoli-Cheese Soup
author: thedailygourmet
summary: I intentionally made this as low carb as possible, but it still has the comfort of a richer broccoli-cheese soup.
ingredients: ¼ cup crema con sal (salted Mexican-style sour cream)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Add onion and butter; saute until fragrant, about 5 minutes
Add broccoli, chicken broth, and whipping cream
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, for 5 minutes, then switch to the quick-release method to release remaining pressure, about 5 minutes
Stir in Cheddar cheese, crema con sal, and garlic granules
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately
